name: GalaxyJump Extended
description:
A continuation of the game "Galaxy Jump" by Alessa Troglauer and Merve Gümüs

made by Kai Heide and Nicolas Ruderisch

Credits:

Alessa Troglauer. Code, Level Design, UI

Nicolas Ruderisch: Code, Level Design, UI

Merve Gümüs: 3D/2D Art, Level Design, UI

Kai Heide: 3D Art, Level Design, SFX

assets from unity asset store; volumetric lines

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/particles-effects/volumetric-lines-2...

Sounds, SFX from Freesound.org
